title: Polynomial Smoothing Function Block
name: LGF_SmoothByPolynomFB
description: This function calculates the smoothed values by polynomial cyclically using a 3rd degree polynomial.

input.name: insert
input.description: Accepts the value at the input `value` at positive edge and outputs a `smoothedValue` if five values have been read in.

input.name: value
input.description: Value that is to be included in the smoothing.

output.name: error
output.description: FALSE: No error, TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: Status of the FB and error identification.

status_codes.16#7000: STATUS_NO_CALL: The block waits for activation through the parameter `enable`.
status_codes.16#7001: STATUS_FIRST_CALL: First call of FB after enabling
status_codes.16#7002: STATUS_SUBSEQUENT_CALL: Processing is active. Subsequent call of FB.
status_codes.16#7010: STATUS_NOT_ENOUGH_VALUES: The block requires five (5) values to calculate a smoothed value.
